name: 2020 (shashwatgandhi88)
description:
2020 has arrived with some shocking surprises to most.

The virus has started spreading to many countries and infecting everybody quickly.

To save your city, prevent the virus from reaching any further.

If you let in more than 50 viruses inside, it is doomed.

Finish all waves of viruses to complete the game.

Enjoy.
